content:
👋 Welcome to the Translation Channel! 
Simply type your message with the target language in brackets, like this: **[fr] Hello**. 
If you don't specify a language (or omit brackets), I'll automatically translate it to English! 🌎✨ 
Available languages: English (en), French (fr), German (de), Spanish (es), Italian (it), Dutch (nl), and Portuguese (pt). Enjoy! 😊
